name: CyberJack (KovaKreative)
description:
Run and Gun your way through the dystopian police state city.

You are Jack, a disembodied cyborg head being hunted by the authoritarian authorities, but you have a secret weapon: The ability to jack into other machinery and take control of it.

Destroy the enemy's head without harming the body in order to take over the chassis and wreak havoc on the evil regime! Every enemy is a potential new host for you to control.

This game has 4 total levels, and two boss fights. See if you can get to the end!

CONTROLS

Mouse & Keyboard / XInput Gamepad:

Move - WASD / Left Analog Stick

Shoot - Left Mouse Click / X

Jump - Space / A

Jack A Body - Right Mouse Click / Y

Standing Aim (Biped only) - Right Shift / Right Trigger

This game was a solo project for the GameDev.tv game jam 2022. It was developed in 10 days. All art assets and music were created within the course of the jam.
